name: Turtle Mahjong
description:
A simple Mahjong Solitaire game with a turtle. 

Select two matching tiles that are free:

  • Tiles with the same image match. Also, the four seasons and flowers match.
  • A tile is free, if it can be moved left or right and has no tile on top of it.

Rotate the camera with right click + drag, two finger swipe or arrow keys ↑→↓←.

Made to learn Godot. Windows and Linux versions are not well tested, please leave a comment if you have problems. iOS is broken, use a desktop computer :)
